content: I know this well because I have a gift of knowledge. When I learn something I can easily share it with others and help them apply it. The thing I had to finally stop doing is just what you said: stop getting sucked into everyone else’s play for my money, need for coaching or desire to learn from others rather than myself. I finally leaned into what I know, stopped following the people who made me feel inadequate without what they sell and focused on my own coaching business, in my own way, and doing my own writing my own way.
